featured.text: He apologized that he could not afford to pay them 25 rupees as he had 39 , but said he would give them five rupees each week without fail.

definition.zh_def: 道歉，表示對自己行為的歉意或懊悔。
definition.en_def: To express regret for something that one has done wrong.
definition.example: I want to apologize for my mistake.
